title: quality: Add comprehensive test suite with VCR cassettes
description: Set up ExVCR for HTTP mocking, create test cassettes for all API endpoints, aim for high coverage
close_reason: Added comprehensive unit test suite with 80 tests covering all modules. ExVCR infrastructure is in place for future integration tests.

title: future: Implement WebSocket streaming for trade updates
description: Implement Alpa.Stream.TradeUpdates GenServer for real-time trade update streaming via WebSocket. Handle reconnection, authentication, and callbacks

title: data: Implement Snapshots API
description: Implement Alpa.MarketData.Snapshots with: get_snapshots/1 for quick market overview

title: trading: Implement Positions API
description: Implement Alpa.Trading.Positions with: list_positions/0, get_position/1, close_position/2, close_all_positions/1

title: core: Implement runtime configuration module
description: Create Alpa.Config module for runtime configuration with: API keys, endpoints (paper/live/data), timeout settings. Support env vars and application config

title: data: Implement Market Data Quotes API
description: Implement Alpa.MarketData.Quotes with: get_quotes/2, get_latest_quotes/1 using v2 market data API

title: core: Implement HTTP client module with Req
description: Create Alpa.Client module using Req library with: auth header injection, base URL configuration, error handling, retry logic, and proper timeout configuration

title: data: Implement Market Data Bars API
description: Implement Alpa.MarketData.Bars with: get_bars/2, get_bars_multi/2 using v2 market data API. Support timeframes, adjustments, feed selection

title: data: Implement Market Data Trades API
description: Implement Alpa.MarketData.Trades with: get_trades/2, get_latest_trades/1 using v2 market data API

title: trading: Implement Orders API
description: Implement Alpa.Trading.Orders with: place_order/1, get_orders/1, get_order/1, get_order_by_client_id/1, replace_order/2, cancel_order/1, cancel_all_orders/0. Support all order types including bracket/OCO

title: trading: Implement Clock and Calendar API
description: Implement Alpa.Trading.Market with: get_clock/0, get_calendar/1, market_open?/0

title: project: Set up new alpa_ex project structure with mix.exs for Elixir 1.16+, Req, TypedStruct
trading: Implement Account API
description: Implement Alpa.Trading.Account with: get_account/0, get_configurations/0, update_configurations/1, get_activities/1, get_portfolio_history/1

title: core: Define TypedStruct models for API responses
description: Create typed structs in Alpa.Models for: Account, Order, Position, Asset, Bar, Quote, Trade, Watchlist, Clock, Calendar. Include JSON decoding

title: trading: Implement Assets API
description: Implement Alpa.Trading.Assets with: list_assets/1, get_asset/1. Support filtering by status, asset_class, exchange

title: quality: Add ExDoc documentation with examples
description: Add comprehensive module and function documentation with usage examples for all public APIs

title: trading: Implement Watchlists API
description: Implement Alpa.Trading.Watchlists with: list_watchlists/0, create_watchlist/1, get_watchlist/1, update_watchlist/2, delete_watchlist/1, add_symbol/2, remove_symbol/2

title: future: Implement WebSocket streaming for market data
description: Implement Alpa.Stream.MarketData for real-time bars, quotes, trades streaming. Support subscription management

title: future: Implement Crypto Trading API
description: Implement Alpa.Crypto for crypto spot trading and wallet operations

title: future: Implement Options Trading API
description: Implement Alpa.Options with: get_contracts/1, get_contract/1 for options trading support
